exception.formatocoord: The entered coordinates are not in the correct format.
exception.nodetectado: No geometries have been detected in this file.
exception.comprobar: Error loading the file. Verify that this is the correct file.
exception.insertado: A permitted file extension has not been inserted. The allowed ones are: KML, SHP (.zip), GPX and GeoJSON.
exception.maxfichero: The selected file exceeds the maximum of 20 MB allowed
exception.ficherosel: Download format has not been selected.
exception.query_profile: The altitude data for this entity could not be queried.
exception.topographic_one_element: The topographic profile can only be made for a single element

help_template.title: Help
help_template.addlayer_content: This tool adds a new vector layer to the map. Clicking on it opens a window in which you can enter the layer name and its legend.
help_template.selection_content: Tool for selecting elements of the layer. There are several tools that work differently if this tool is active or not.
help_template.creation_content:
Tool to draw different types of geometry on the selected layer.
  • Point (): Allows you to draw a point by clicking on the map.
  • Point by coordinates (): Allows you to create a point by entering the coordinates.
  • Line(): Allows you to draw a line on the map. One click draws a point or vertex, double click ends the drawing.
  • Polygon(): Allows you to draw a polygon on the map. One click draws a point or vertex, double click ends the drawing.
  • Figure(): Allows you to draw a regular or irregular figure on the map. One click sets the upper left corner, a second click ends the drawing.
  • Text(): Allows you to write text at a point on the map.
help_template.edition_content:
Tool for editing the geometries of the elements of the layer.
  • Edit geometry (): Allows you to edit the vertices of a geometry.
  • Hole (): Allows you to create a hole in an element. Only valid for polygons.
  • Rotate (): Allows you to rotate the selected elements.
  • Scale (): Allows to scale the selected elements.
  • Move (): Allows you to move the selected elements.
  • Edit attributes (): Allows you to edit the attributes of the layer elements or the selected elements.
  • Clear (): Allows you to delete all the elements of the layer.
help_template.style_content: Tool for editing the styles of the selected layer or elements. Divided into point, line or polygon styles.
help_template.analysis_content:
Tool for different geographic analyses.
  • Topographic profile (): Allows the display of a graphic that represents the relief of the terrain. In the case of point elements, only their height and coordinates is shown.
  • Influence area (): Allows an area of influence of an element to be drawn.
help_template.download_content: This tool allows you to download the complete layer or selected elements in GeoJSON, KML and Shapefile format.

clear_geometries_msg: Are you sure you want to remove all elements from the layer?
